questions.question_text: Do you have any other remarks for the NLP4RE ID Card?
questions.answer: Maybe this paper is borderline for the format of this card, specially section IV, as it does not use a requirement dataset and it focused on language modeling for ambiguity detection which is an accessory aspect with respect to RE.
